snippet: The driver received two citations: one for failing to yield to a pedestrian in a crosswalk and another for failing to use due care in the operation of his vehicle.
abstract: New York CIty police are investigating incident in which truck struck and killed 6-year-old Amar Diarrassouba as he was walking to his East Harlem elementary school; driver received two citations for failing to yield to a pedestrian in a crosswalk and failing to use due care, but no criminal charges have been filed pending further investigation.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and RANDY LEONARD

lead_paragraph: The driver received two citations: one for failing to yield to a pedestrian in a crosswalk and another for failing to use due care in the operation of his vehicle.

headline.seo: Truck Kills Boy, 6, as He Walks to East Harlem School
